title: Trump Administration Coronavirus Response
itunes:title: Trump Administration Coronavirus Response
description:
Kevin discussed the latest updates on Coronavirus with guests: Bloomberg White House reporter Justin Sink, Doug Heye, Republican Strategist and Former Deputy Chief of Staff for Former House Majority Leader Eric Cantor, Matt Bennett, Democratic Strategist and Third Way Co-Founder and Kriti Gupta, Bloomberg Markets live team reporter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
